Headline: Westbound #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 35th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: Westbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Shield, 33rd, Wallace, and 35th due to, construction near 35th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Shield, 33rd, Wallace, and 35th due to, construction near 35th/Wentworth.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Austin
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Austin due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Austin due to a sick customer. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
